headline.main: CHILDREN MARK WORK OF BRITISH AID GROUP; Cake Is Presented to Mayor on First Anniversary

lead_paragraph: Mayor La Guardia endorsed yesterday the work of Young America Wants to Help when Mrs. Kermit Roosevelt, national chairman of the organization, reported on its first year of aid to refugee children in Great Britain at City Hall.
abstract: Young Amer Wants to Help marks 1st anniv; Mrs K Roosevelt, natl chmn, repts on aid to refugee children in Brit; Mayor LaGuardia endorses soc's work; illus
snippet: Mayor La Guardia endorsed yesterday the work of Young America Wants to Help when Mrs. Kermit Roosevelt, national chairman of the organization, reported on its first year of aid to refugee children in Great Britain at City Hall....
